III.ii.2.F.3.c
.
Limitations and Use of Extracts From SGO Records
Extracts from the SGO records contain very little detail.Â  VA primarily uses them only when the STRs of a Veteran with service during WWII or the Korean Conflict
are obviously incomplete, or
were destroyed by the fire at NPRC in 1973.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F - Fire-Related Records, Supplementary or Substitute Records, and Records for Unique Situations
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F
